Name: 69 Berta Hot
About the game: 69 Berta Hot - Puzzle with visual novel elements. Your maid Berta was caught stealing and now it's easy for her to make amends with you. Don't miss the opportunity to see all her hidden talents. Features Interactive gallery Atmospheric music Meditative gameplay Sweet girl
